author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

PowerShell Console has a "suggestions framework" that enables making suggestions to the user.  It currently has a [small set of suggestions](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f17601298b87827a94ba029e2159399e1245c077/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/hostifaces/HostUtilities.cs#L61).  Suggestions are currently written directly to the console as it's meant only for interactive use.

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Consider either changing the output to use InformationStream or using a test hook to enable capturing the suggestion and validating it is working correctly.
title: Add tests for Suggestions
